titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to carry out a pilot program on the prediction and prevention of musculoskeletal injuries in members of the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.
Military Readiness and Injury Prevention Act of 2019
Military Readiness and Injury Prevention Act of 2019
Military Readiness and Injury Prevention Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
